title: The Jury Is Out … and So Are the Rioters | Guest: Andrew Branca | 4/20/21
description:
The fate of Derek Chauvin, who’s accused of killing George Floyd, is in the hands of the jury. But can a decision be made without ending with riots at this point? Rep. Maxine Waters made inciteful remarks about the trial, and the judge called her out. Capitol Police officer Brian Sicknick’s cause of death has finally been revealed. Self-defense attorney Andrew Branca joins to explain Minnesota’s weird definition of “murder” and what the jury must weigh when deciding the verdict for each charge. Glenn shares two stories that prove China isn’t our future … it’s already here. Glenn lists politically correct words that we should stop using. As the Senate meets on "Jim Crow 2021," Glenn explains how offensive that comparison is.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
